analysis_period.description: Analysis period covers 60 months of prices, yielding 59 months of returns (January 2021 to November 2025)

data_sources.market_indices: MSCI Europe index via iShares Core MSCI Europe ETF (IEUR)
data_sources.risk_free_rates: All countries use German 3-month Bund (EUR) - processed from historical bond yield data

main_findings.interpretation: Beta does not explain cross-sectional variation in returns

notes: Complete analysis addressing all assignment requirements. Includes market-cap weighted betas, portfolio optimization, value effects, and portfolio recommendations. All countries use German Bund rate (EUR) as risk-free rate. Note: Minimum-variance portfolio allows short selling (weights can be negative, bounded by [-1, 1]), while tangency portfolio and efficient frontier use long-only constraints (weights bounded by [0, 1]).
